title: As if laners taking smite for cinderhulk wasn't bad enough
body:
Now laners have an even better reason, AP laners anyway.

Smite enchant + lich bane

Getting a bit ridiculous. Anyone who would have built lich bane before is just going to take smite. Because why not also get the smite enchant along with it? Not to mention the sustain when roaming.. just attack a monster while you're walking past.. or come back from dragon with most of your mana returned.

Then they'll have to nerf it, screwing jungers over
